title: Slow Cooker Thai Chicken Tacos
directions: Combine other ingredients in a large bowl and whisk together to combine. Pour into the crockpot.
Cook on low heat for 2 hours. Remove chicken thighs, saving the liquid from the crockpot if desired. Shred the chicken. Serve on tortillas, in sandwiches, or over rice!
ingredients: 1/2 Tablespoon fish sauce (or additional soy sauce)
